title: A Comparative Study on Optimizing Electrocoagulation for Organic Contaminant Removal in Shale Gas Fracturing Wastewater

Shale gas fracturing wastewater (FW) exhibits high total dissolved solids (TDS) content, averaging 13 g/L, along with an average total suspended solids (TSS) content of 676 mg/L and an average...
